entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 late this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 24. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
